title: Hailstones and halibut bones. Part 2
brief_description: A sequel to Part 1, produced to illustrate the verses which make up the balance of the poem by Mary O’Neill from her book “Hailstones and halibut bones”. Uses animated drawings to depict the colors blue, grey, orange, purple and brown. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
